wiki.content:
The song was written as a man's apology for his involvement in an abortion. Its first person lyrics address the child he might have had.
 
 It's featuring a sample from the song "Gomenasai" by t.A.T.u., it was released as the album's second single on December 27, 2005. The band has performed the song with t.A.T.u live in Germany before. According to their MySpace page, R&B artist Akon saw a video of their performance and offered to work with them.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The song was written as a man's apology for his involvement in an abortion. Its first person lyrics address the child he might have had.  It's featuring a sample from the song "Gomenasai" by t.A.T.u., it was released as the album's second single on December 27, 2005. The band has performed the song with t.A.T.u live in Germany before. According to their MySpace page, R&B artist Akon saw a video of their performance and offered to work with them.

track.name: Happy Birthday
comments: no words to describe how much I love this song. it evokes such a deep feelings
omg this song is so sad and deep, it makes me cry...
I love this. such good lyrics.
Such a deep song with such a strong meaning. Simply amazing <3
t.A.T.u. sings in some parts, they just add beats to the song "Gomenasai"... it should say "FLIPSYDE FEAT. t.A.T.u." not just "FLIPSYDE".
elective abortion is a kind of murder. im not ready to have a kid but my conscience knows

My wife had a miscarriage at 4 months, 8 weeks ago though we had a beautiful baby girl. Lots in this song matched my feeling and thoughts. Almost brought me to tears. Just wish it wasn't about an abortion...
I'm not into rap music, but this song is really awesome. The lyrics are f***ing great.
wtf... they stole the beat from Tatu
Today is my Bday. :D Great Song !
Thanks U R a Sweet. I will light 2, one 4 me and another for U . faszinationen
What happened to a normal happy birthday song. Why they gotta rap to be smooth homey.
I really REALLY like this song... It's sad but it really says a lot.
oh my gosh. these people totally stole this song from Porta and translated it from spanish to english. the original is called "mi rosa negra" by "Porta" and this one isnt even as good as the original
